sentences.english: She was never behind in offering advice.
sentences.chinese: 她在出諫言獻策方面從不落於人後。

sentences.english: Did you ever read what I wrote you?
Here are a few of their words of wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 下面是他們中的一些出彩的智慧諫言。

sentences.english: He is advising the Chinese government on renewable energy policies.
sentences.chinese: 施正榮向中國政府諫言可再生能源政策。

definition: Xiao He (-193 BC), famous strategist and chancellor, fought on Liu Bang's 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] side during the Chu-Han Contention 楚漢戰爭|楚汉战争[Chu3 Han4 Zhan4 zheng1]
running of armed forces/military management/to govern armed forces/to direct troops
Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
scramble for power and profit (idiom); power struggle
to love the common people as one's own children (praise for a virtuous ruler)
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
